segments.text: Ugh, this kitchen is a disaster. The sink is overflowing, and the woman is just standing there, drying dishes.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water is everywhere, and she doesn't even seem to notice.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can't stand how messy this is, it's just gross.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The kids are being so naughty, trying to sneak cookies like that.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: That boy is going to fall off that stool, and it's going to be a huge mess.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is just standing there, waiting for her cookie, not a care in the world.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wish someone would just clean this all up and make it stop.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The garden outside looks so nice, it's a shame the inside is such a mess.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can't believe how much of a disaster this is, it's just awful.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Someone needs to do something about this, it's just unacceptable.
segments.speaker: PAR
